channel.title: Mandelbrot on MetalBlueberry
channel.description: Recent content in Mandelbrot on MetalBlueberry

item.title: Mandelbrot Parallel Computation
item.description: This post explains how to parallelize the computational task of the Mandelbrot set and generate a terminal tool to generate images.

item.title: Go CPU profiling
item.description: Let’s take a look to Go CPU profiling tools to optimize the mandelbrot set calculation from previous post.

item.title: Mandelbrot Set Calculation
item.description: The Mandelbrot set is one of the most famous fractals and it is really simple to draw. Personally I enjoy a lot seeing how simple rules lead to complex patterns.
